content.description: 1 - Remains active after interaction. 2 - Deactivates when player isn't colliding. 3 - Deactivates after the 'time' parameter expires. 4 - Toggle mode.

eventcolli.description: Event to trigger when enabling with the object.

event_off.description: Event to trigger when disabling with the object.

time.description: Time taken for the switch to go inactive with certain behaviours.

Extra.name: A magic floating orb that remotely activates things.
